name: jsdoc-to-markdown
author: Lloyd Brookes
description: Generates markdown API documentation from jsdoc annotated source code

scripts.docs: node bin/cli.js lib/*.js --heading-depth 1 --template jsdoc2md/API.hbs > docs/API.md; echo
scripts.cover: istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/test-runner test/*.js && cat coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/.bin/coveralls && rm -rf coverage; echo
